text: Irene Miller was a British screenwriter active during the silent era. She began her career as a journalist before getting work as a scenarist, and she eventually became chief of the department at Will Barker's studio; later on, she'd become a studio publicist. == Selected filmography == * The Children of Gibeon (1920) * The Night Riders (1920) * Edge o' Beyond (1919) * The Lamp of Destiny (1919) * The Life of a London Actress (1919) * Her Lonely Soldier (1919) * Jo the Crossing Sweeper (1918) * On Leave (1918) * Meg o' the Woods (1918) * Mrs. Cassell's Profession (1915) == References == Category:Screenwriter stubs Category:British women screenwriters Category:1880 births Category:1964 deaths Category:20th-century British screenwriters
title: Irene Miller
